item.description:
Join Malini to see Indie Rock band "Yo La Tengo" at Toad's Place!

Yo La Tengo is a Indie or Alternative Rock group started over a quarter decade ago in New Jersey.  YLT as they are also known, is recognized not just for it's unique tunes that have achieved limited mainstream success, but it's "encyclopedic repertoire of cover songs". Find out more about the band here at thier website or here at Wikipedia.  Plenty of samples available on Itunes and Myspace.

The concert is at the well known Toads Place, and tickets are $20.  You can purchase them ahead of time either Here On Toads Website or Exile on Main Street Records in Brandford. 

Doors open at 8:00 PM, the Show starts at 9:15.

Malini will host this meetup, and can be reached at 315-723-2306.
item.how_to_find_us: Malini will host this meetup, and can be reached at 315-723-2306.
item.name: Yo La Tengo Concert
